alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 6:52AM EST until January 31 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. A light wintry mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain is expected through mid- morning. Precipitation will decrease in coverage late this morning and afternoon with most areas receiving a little light snow. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
